attributes.action: Allow public to vote about the UK helping Ukraine in the war against Russia
attributes.additional_details: Most people in the UK do not want our prime minister to send equipment to Ukraine to fight against Russia
attributes.background: Give every public citizen the right to vote on whether the UK should be giving Ukraine equipment for war against Russia

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629895
